name: 🍒 I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU'RE GOING TO PLAY THIS!
name_original: 🍒 I CAN'T BELIEVE YOU'RE GOING TO PLAY THIS!
description:
Don't believe it!🐸

🍍 Well, I can’t really imagine why you’re here unless you wish to die frustratingly and miserably sometimes! 

🍓 "I can’t Believe you’re going to play this" consists of a platform game whose goal is to reach its end with the highest number of fruits and the lowest number of deaths and time possible!

Want to try not to die? Just wish good luck with this, you will need! 

Version: BETA 2.1

Developer: Marina Cacer

University: Universidade do Vale do Itajai - UNIVALI

Class: Applied.Prog/Game Engines
